Title: The Last Temptation of Christ
Cast: Willem Dafoe, Harvey Keitel, Paul Greco, Steve Shill, Verna Bloom, Barbara Hershey, Roberts Blossom, Barry Miller, Gary Basaraba, Irvin Kershner, Victor Argo, Michael Been, Paul Herman, John Lurie, Leo Burmester
Plot: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross. The carpenter, Jesus of Nazareth, tormented by the temptations of demons, the guilt of making crosses for the Romans, pity for men and the world, and the constant call of God, sets out to find what God wills for Him. But as His mission nears fulfillment, He must face the greatest temptation; the normal life of a good man. Based, not on the Gospels, but on Nikos Kazantzakis' novel of the same name. Written by Nick Lopez <ntlopez@fas.harvard.edu>
Keywords: reference to jesus christ, temptation, carpenter, exorcism, faith
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 6 nominations.
Actors: Willem Dafoe, Harvey Keitel, Barbara Hershey
Description: Directed by Martin Scorsese.  With Willem Dafoe, Harvey Keitel, Barbara Hershey, Paul Greco. The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.
